name: CinderEllard
description:
One month game demo: Embark on a crazy adventure to help Cinderella fulfil her destiny, and become a true princess. 

Game features:

-more than 3 types of crazy;

-a romantic story with a few twists and turns;

-likeable characters, that either we like or we don´t;

-amazing discoveries about nature;

-made with extra love;
